title: Indrani Haar: Exquisite Peacock and Emerald Necklace
materials: Ruby accents. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster.
features: This stunning Haaram features intricate peacock (Mayura) motifs set within circular frames. Each peacock is crafted with delicate Polki diamonds and crowned with a vibrant Emerald. Ruby accents add a touch of warmth. The necklace showcases exceptional Nakshi work, a testament to traditional South Indian craftsmanship, perfectly blending modern gemstone cuts with timeless design.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of heritage to contemporary outfits.
description: Timeless heirloom piece, handcrafted by skilled artisans. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and royalty. This Haaram is an investment in artistry and tradition, passed down through generations. The use of natural, high-quality emeralds and Polki diamonds ensures brilliance and lasting value. The piece offers a harmonious blend of traditional design with modern elegance.
